mapper.select: select dd.*,dc.partition_id,l.line_name from device_data dd,device_config dc,(select max(id) id from device_data group by terminal_id) a, line l, device d where dd.id = a.id and dd.terminal_id = dc.terminal_id and dc.partition_id = #{partitionId} and d.terminal_id=dc.terminal_id and d.line_id=l.line_id
select ca.terminal_id,ca.channel_id,ca.name from channel_attribute ca,device_config dc where dc.partition_id = #{partitionId} and ca.terminal_id = dc.terminal_id and ca.is_use = 1

select d.name,dd.*,dc.partition_id from device_data dd,device_config dc,(select max(id) id from device_data group by terminal_id) a,device d where dd.id = a.id and dd.terminal_id = dc.terminal_id AND dd.terminal_id =#{terminalId} and d.terminal_id=dd.terminal_id group by terminal_id
